DataElement.preferredDefinition: Dose modification type occurring in week 1.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._Any period of seven consecutive days._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1_A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any period of seven consecutive days.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

Concepts.definition: Any period of seven consecutive days.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Divisions to represent changes in a dose delivered to an individual.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.: To join or unite with others so as to increase size, quantity, or scope.
